project_path.ethereum-contracts: contracts/Audit Report - Animoca Core Library V2/ethereum-contracts

findings.title: Contracts cannot transfer ownership
findings.description: The contracts ERC20MintBurnProxied and ERC20FixedSupplyProxied cannot transfer ownership, as they do not inherit from ContractOwnershipBase.
